climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: EFFECTIVE CLEANING: Take these cleaning cloths in the perfect size (11.5"X 11.5") to clean your worktop, kitchen, windows, or even your car and other delicate surfaces. With just water or cleaner, you can achieve streak-free and neat results.
LINT-FREE & SCRATCH-FREE: Made of 87% Polyester and 13% Polyamide, these cleaning rags are soft to the touch and lint-free. They will not scratch or damage any finishes. Clean with confidence.

REUSABLE & DURABLE: These cleaning towels can be used repeatedly hundreds of times. With reinforced edges, they are designed to be long-lasting and won't easily break. Make a positive impact on the environment by reducing the use of paper towels.

VERSATILE & EASY TO WASH: Not only suitable for general cleaning tasks, but also great for cleaning car exteriors or interiors, electronics, eyeglasses, screens, and more. After use, simply rinse them or throw them into your washing machine, as they are completely safe.

GIFT OPTION& WORRY-FREE SERVICE: Add our soft and ultra-absorbent microfiber towels to your household cleaning supply arsenal. Step into a world of clean comfort with Homexcel microfiber cleaning cloths.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought more expensive microfiber cloths before and these feel the same if not better. I bought the 50 count/4 color pack and I mainly use them to clean my car. They work especially well for cleaning the bug splatter on the headlights and front end of the car. You obviously have to apply pressure and multiple passes, but they effectively remove the bug mess without scratching the clear coat. I like having multiple colors that way I use the same color for the same task every time, and I can keep the ones I use for waxing separate when washing them.The cloth itself is thin but doesn't feel cheaply woven. The size is fairly small, so if you're using them for big projects (washing, waxing, drying, etc.) expect to use several for each task, but that's why I bought the 50 count pack. The cloths do leave lint behind if you use them straight out of the bag, but after the first wash the lint left behind is minimal and are perfect for dusting/cleaning the interior of the car.Overall, I'm happy with these cloths. Quality is more than adequate for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life-Changing Alternative to Paper Towels
reviews.reviewText: These HOMEXCEL Microfiber Cleaning Cloths have completely revolutionized the way I approach cleaning in my household. Before discovering these incredible cloths, I was a self-proclaimed paper towel addict, mindlessly using them for every little spill or cleaning task. Little did I realize the financial drain it was causing, adding up to over $100 a month on paper towels alone.What prompted me to make the switch was my experience at the car wash, where they use similar microfiber towels for cleaning and drying cars. These towels are incredibly absorbent and effective, and I was impressed by how well they performed. It got me thinking, why not use these at home?So, I purchased three packs of these HOMEXCEL Microfiber Cleaning Cloths, and it turned out to be a game-changer. I have a dedicated drawer in my kitchen cabinets filled to the brim with these cloths. Now, whenever there's a mess or a cleaning task, my instinct is to grab one of these microfiber towels.What makes them so remarkable is their reusability. I use each cloth once, whether it's dirty or not, and then toss it in the washing machine. They come out of the wash spotlessly clean, fresh, and smelling good, ready to be used again and again.Even if I use them for something unsanitary or one-time-use, the affordability of these cloths allows me to throw them away without hesitation. They are so inexpensive that it's a cost-effective choice, saving me a significant amount of money compared to my previous paper towel habit.In summary, these HOMEXCEL Microfiber Cleaning Cloths are a life-changing alternative to paper towels. They are incredibly versatile, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly. Whether you need to clean up spills, dry dishes, or tackle any household task, these cloths are up to the challenge. Say goodbye to excessive paper towel expenses and make the switch to these microfiber cloths – you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like microfiber cloths for doing dishes. These are the best I've ever had.They're a good size, 11" x 11.5". I find these large enough to easily cover a reasonable surface area but small enough to get into glassware.They're very soft and absorbent. They sop up liquids without smearing them all over while trying to pick them up.One side has some texture to it whereas the other side is smooth, but not slick.They clean up well. I got black cloths. They didn't bleed when I washed them with other towels although they do tend to pick up a little lint if they're washed with other towels.On the whole, these are just what I was looking for. It would have been nice to have other colors to choose from but these are working for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice microfiber cloths.
reviews.reviewText: Absorbent towels used for deep cleaning the bathroom. They are easy to wash/dry after use. The only complaint is I wish they were slightly bigger and thicker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Complete change! Arrived horrible, end result amazing!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Was as hard as a rock when package got here. Opened package and they were perfect size squared. But paper thin. Will not absorb water. Will definitely not be able to dry anything without so many that it would be pointless to try. Very very disappointed. I order microfiber so I could get a thicker product. One side is scratchy, and the other is sort of soft. But definitely not like a thicker product like I was hoping for! Will now have to go to my dollar store to buy my go to brand for a dollar a cloth! I added a video above for the video of the product I just bought, and a picture on the right that shows this product on the left, and my go to dollar store brand on the right. Heading to dollar store for more! ***complete change*** I washed them in Downy Calm Vanilla and lavender fabric softener… they turned out absolutely perfect!! So fluffy, soft and super absorbent! Highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite cleaning rags
reviews.reviewText: I use the different colors for different jobs so that I don't cross contaminate or accidentally use a towel with a chemical that may harm a surface. (Blue is for glass, yellow for the bathroom, green for my wood furniture...etc. The soak up moisture in a flash and are almost dry after being rung out well. They launder well and hold their quality. They are very soft and perfect for fragile/delicate surfaces because they don't scratch. I wouldn't use them for scrubbing surfaces, but they are ideal for most other jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and very functional! I use these to clean my dogs paws after coming in from our yard. They are soft but durable. I’ve also used them on some cleaning around the house! And who doesn’t love the fun colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best but they work
reviews.reviewText: These are very thin. They are the perfect size for a swiffer mop though. Just wish they were thicker. They are so thin I dont think they’ll last long so good thing you get a bunch per pack. That’s my opinion based on using them for mopping; for just counter wiping I guess they’d be perfect.
Super soft, durable, wipes and dries well

I decided to switch to microfiber clothes for cleaning purpose and turns out it was a good decision. I can see that the quality of these clothes is way better. Also they are super absorbent which makes my kitchen cleaning better. I love the fact that they come in four different colors and there are two of each color which is plenty for me. Currently I am using green and yellow for kitchen ( Green for dishes and yellow for countertops). I am using blue and pink for bathroom ( blue for toilet and pink for counter). Lets see how long they last but from what I have read in the reviews they last for really long time, depending on how often you wash them and use them.
Son buenos. Buena calidad. Buen precio. No tan absorbentes que algodón but muy bueno para limpieza en general.
Its a useful product at an affordable price. Good for cleaning purposes and drying kitchen utensils.
These do a great job of soaking up water. Exactly as expected. Great product!
